column4: Breakingviews - How Comcast can boost its chances of snaring Fox
column5: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Comcast can boost its chances of snaring Fox. The cable company is preparing to scuttle Walt Disney’s $52.4 billion bid for some of Rupert Murdoch’s media assets  and a major Fox shareholder is receptive to the idea. But Comcast Chief Executive Brian Roberts may want to offer more than just the best price to get a hearing.

column4: Breakingviews - U.S. threatens autos with scorched-earth gambit
column5: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - The White House is threatening the automotive industry with a scorched-earth gambit. President Donald Trump on Wednesday asked Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross to consider a so-called Section 232 investigation on all imports of vehicles and parts. That may well just be his fuel-injected bargaining chip for negotiations with partners in NAFTA  the North American trade pact. If the levies actually happen  though  it would leave domestic and foreign automakers reeli

column4: Stock market value of Netflix eclipses Disney for first time

column4: Breakingviews - How Comcast can boost its chances of snaring Fox
column5: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Comcast can boost its chances of snaring Fox. The cable company is preparing to scuttle Walt Disney’s $52.4 billion bid for some of Rupert Murdoch’s media assets  and a major Fox shareholder is receptive to the idea. But Comcast Chief Executive Brian Roberts may want to offer more than just the best price to get a hearing.

column4: Netflix's stock market value eclipses Disney's for first time
